name: zookeeper-pending-syncs
body:
- alert: zookeeper pending syncs warning
  expr: avg by (host, environment) (zookeeper_pending_syncs) > [[.warning]]
  for: '[[.for]]'
  labels:
    alertname: zookeeper pending syncs on host {{ $labels.host }} is greater than "[[.warning]]"
    environment: '{{ $labels.environment }}'
    severity: WARNING
    team: '[[.team]]'
  annotations:
    metric_name: zookeeper_pending_syncs
    metric_value: '{{ $value }}'
    resource: '{{ $labels.host }}'
    summary: zookeeper pending sync on host {{ $labels.host }} is {{ $value }}
    template: zookeeper-pending-syncs
- alert: zookeeper pending sync critical
  expr: avg by (host, environment) (zookeeper_pending_syncs) > [[.critical]]
  for: '[[.for]]'
  labels:
    alertname: zookeeper pending syncs on host {{ $labels.host }} is greater than "[[.critical]]"
    environment: '{{ $labels.environment }}'
    severity: CRITICAL
    team: '[[.team]]'
  annotations:
    metric_name: zookeeper_pending_syncs
    metric_value: '{{ $value }}'
    resource: '{{ $labels.host }}'
    summary: zookeeper oustanding requests on host {{ $labels.host }} is {{ $value }}
    template: zookeeper-pending-syncs

variables.name: team
variables.description: For eg team name which the alert should go to

name: kafka-under-replicated-partitions
body:
- alert: kafka under replicated partitions warning
  expr: sum by (host, environment) (v2_jolokia_kafka_server_ReplicaManager_UnderReplicatedPartitionsValue) > [[.warning]]
  for: '[[.for]]'
  labels:
    alertname: number of under replicated partitions on host {{ $labels.host }} is {{ $value }}
    environment: '{{ $labels.environment }}'
    severity: WARNING
    team: '[[.team]]'
  annotations:
    metric_name: kafka_under_replicated_partitions
    metric_value: '{{ $value }}'
    resource: '{{ $labels.host }}'
    summary: under replicated partitions on host {{ $labels.host }} is {{ $value }} is greather than [[.warning]]
    template: kafka-under-replicated-partitions

variables.name: team
variables.description: For eg team name which the alert should go to
